name: heart attack (Arcadim)
description:
Resources are the name of the game. You cant move without any energy, but if you stand still your energy meter will slowly fill up. You can also collect energy pickups for a quick boost.

Your objective is to get 5 happiness before your opponent. You do that by collecting hearts and pills. Hearts spawn around the map, but pills can only be obtained from your opponent. To get pills, you can either shoot them with a heart, or lay down a trap and hope they step into it.

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move, Down to set a trap

Space/Right Shift - Shoot
